name: Bittercup

topics.topic_text: Bittercup? That's the dumbest name I've ever heard!
topics.response_text: No one understands me. You're just like all the others around here.

topics.topic_text: I'm sorry... erm... Bittercup. What were you saying?
topics.response_text: Finally! Someone who doesn't judge me! You know, the people here are just so quick to assume that they know everything about you.

topics.topic_text: I don't know about that, but Bittercup is one dumbass name.
topics.response_text: FINE! Be that way! You'll be sorry! You'll all be sorry!{Breaks into a pathetic sob at the end.}

topics.topic_text: Whatever you say.

topics.topic_text: If you don't mind me saying, you look different from everyone else.

topics.topic_text: What's there to do around here, Bittercup?
topics.response_text: I wander around town to find chalk and makeup sometimes. Not like there's anyplace to buy stuff.{Bittercup is self-absorbed in her own, gothy world.}

topics.topic_text: This place looks like a ghost town.
topics.response_text: I wish it were. When I'm gone, I'll be sure to haunt this place ... <sigh>{Bittercup pleasantly sighs at the thought of ghosts and death.}

topics.topic_text: You and the other people here don't seem to get along.
topics.response_text: Red and Kimba won't talk to me, just because I used to date Pappy and Flash! They're so jealous!

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: I'm getting bored. I thought you were going to teach us something.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for a woman named Red. Sticky promised me some caps...
topics.response_text: The Super Mutants took Red along with the others. She was the only person that really ever listened to me.{sad}

topics.topic_text: Do you know where the Super Mutants took your friends?
topics.response_text: There's a police station up there to the northeast or something. Bury our friends corpses if you find them. I've got enough ghosts haunting me.{grateful but trying to hide it}

topics.topic_text: Wow, you need therapy. Look, do you know where your friends are?
topics.response_text: The mutants took them north. To some old police station or something. Let's talk about something else...{goth chick}

topics.topic_text: Hey, Earth to gloom girl  Do you know where the Mutants took the villagers?
topics.response_text: They took them to Germantown. Probably to that old police station. Why you got a death wish?{trying to sound calm but really depressed and scared}

topics.topic_text: Your friends are dead. Maybe you can channel them from the afterlife? Freak.
topics.response_text: Maybe. Or maybe I'll just cast a hex on you! Make your skin fall off and your hair turn into snakes... or something vile like that.{let down, depressed, and angry.}

topics.topic_text: I'll think about it, but I can't rescue your friends now.
topics.response_text: Well if you change your mind let me know, in the meantime I'll be preparing a nasty hex spell. When your skin starts peeling, you'll know why.{let down, depressed, and angry.}

topics.topic_text: Quit moping around. I'll rescue your friends!
topics.response_text: Really? I mean... they aren't really my friends. I don't have any friends. I don't need any... but it would be nice to have them around again!{goth chick trying to seem cool but is really happy to have a hero}

topics.topic_text: I'll rescue your friends, but its going to cost you.
topics.response_text: Rescue whoever the hell you like, but they aren't my friends. I don't NEED friends. Though I'm sure someone will pay you if you succeed.{hurt and resentful }

description:
Bittercup is a 22 year-old Caucasian Female.

A young woman with a rebellious streak and apathetic attitude, Bittercup is a resident of Big Town who spends more time on her appearance with homemade makeup and dark clothing than on helping defend the settlement. Despite her self-involved nature, she has managed to attract the romantic attention of most of the males in Big Town at one point or another, though she doesn't reciprocate their advances physically.

Bittercup's Personality: Apathetic, self-involved, rebellious, cynical, and attention-seeking

Bittercup's Backstory: Born before the Great War, Bittercup spent her early years in the relative safety of Little Lamplight. As she grew older, she moved to Big Town, a settlement for young adults who have outgrown Little Lamplight. In Big Town, she developed a reputation for being romantically involved with most of the male residents, though she never took these relationships physically. She had a particular interest in Pappy, whom she left shortly after arriving in Big Town, convinced that he was a liar. She then became involved with Flash, whose mental state deteriorated due to her constant teasing and rejection.
